title: Slave to the Empire: An Erotic Star Wars Adventure
description: Stolen from her home planet of Tralus in the Corellian system at a young age, Myrii has never really known true freedom. Sold to a pleasure house on Rakata Prime, she has known no other life than the one she has within Rasa Rayal's Garden. When Fenn Darius, an Iridonian rogue with credits to spend decides that he wants to own her for more than just a night, Myrii will have to choose between a battle to the death to earn her freedom with him, or submit to a lifetime of servitude at the hands of her cruel masters. Slave to the Empire is an erotic adventure set in the expanded Star Wars universe and is best enjoyed by readers over the age of 18.
author: Ravyn Jade
